name: New Year Simulator 202X
description:
What it is? New Year Simulator 202X is a standalone micro sandbox game. It's created to simulate a safe space where anyone can experience fireworks safely without any serious risk of injury. You have unlimited amount of fireworks at your disposal and it's up to you what you do with them. 

Why I made this? Every year many will suffer different level of eye damage/burns and other serious injuries while operating with fireworks. Pets and animals in general are affected by the loud noises and also suffer unwanted stress due to loud firework noises. Fireworks also means a huge carbon footprint in form of trash, manufacturing waste and even possible fires/property damage. With this simulator anyone can safely experience fireworks in a safe environment while also avoiding these issues.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Minimum Requirements

Modern PC with (Windows 7 or 10 64-bit)
4GB RAM
2GB VRAM
5GB storage
Keyboard + mouse

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

1: Download the .RAR file

2: Extract .RAR file to your preferred folder

3: Find PPDesert.exe file and double click it

4: Enjoy

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: This experience might contain flashing lights and fast moving elements that might trigger/cause seizures for some people. Creator is not responsible for any damage/harm done to players or their hardware.
